description: Fails on GL (not investigated why), but test looks for a race condition in K8S which was fixed in K8S v1.9.x and uses GitRepo type volumes which are deprecated since K8S v1.11.0

testcase: [sig-storage] PersistentVolumes NFS when invoking the Recycle reclaim policy should test that a PV becomes Available and is clean after the PVC is deleted.
description: Fails on shoots with allowPrivilegedContainers=false because the recycling pod is not assigned any PSP and thus cannot mount nfs volumes. Recycling reclaim mode is anyway deprecated since K8s v1.10, see https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/24ab5e9ed0cd01e06fb2df2b3f704f45c780410d
